thread.title: BYU football creates Homecoming hype video
thread.title_full: BYU football creates Homecoming hype video

author: Steven Potter
title: BYU football creates Homecoming hype video
text:
BYU football creates Homecoming hype video By Steven Potter on October 9, 2015. 
BYU (3–2) prepares to take on East Carolina (3–2) this weekend for the first time in school history. It will be the first time any school from North or South Carolina has ventured to Provo to play the Cougars in football. Per contract agreements, the Cougars will travel to Greenville, South Carolina in 2017 to play the Pirates for the Cougars first trip to the Carolinas in school history. 
In celebration of Homecoming week, BYU football created a video hype video sharing the culture and uniqueness of Brigham Young University and its student body. Author's latest posts Steven Potter Steven is Web Editor at the Universe. His passions are sports, eating and reading. Follow him on Twitter @evenstevenp. Latest posts by Steven Potter ( Posts )
